name: CASE Group
tag_list: cooling-towers, coal-gasifiers, frp-cooling-towers, gensets, material-handling, air-pollution-solution, water-treatmet-solutions
overview:
CASE for Complete Engineering Solutions.

Established 2 decades back with its head office at New Delhi and manufacturing units at Bahadurgarh, Kolkata and Bangalore, the company is now the market leader in the field of cooling solutions, Coal Gasification, Air Pollution Solutions and Water Treatment Solutions. CASE is backed up by vibrant and dynamic marketing team, who are capable of understanding and delivering state-of-the art technologies as per the demand and requirements of the clients. A relentless After-Scales team adds to the satisfaction levels of the end user.

The main motto of CASE is to deliver globally the best of quality products at the most economic rates within minimum lead times.

offices.address1: 117, Charmwood Plaza, Charmwood Village, Haryana, Faridabad
